info.name: NexSentia - Complete API
info.description:
Complete API collection for NexSentia Platform - Organizational & Business Weak-Signal Detection

Includes: Authentication, Users, Tenants, Audit Logs, Jira Integration, Slack Integration, and Teams Integration

item.name: Health Check

request.description: API root endpoint - Returns basic API information and health status
Health check endpoint for monitoring services
Simple ping endpoint to test connectivity

item.description: Public endpoints for API health monitoring

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Register a new user. Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number/special character.

**Optional:** tenantId (if not provided, creates new tenant)
Login with email and password. Returns user profile and JWT tokens.
Refresh access token using refresh token
Get current authenticated user profile
Logout current user and invalidate tokens
Request password reset email. Sends reset token to user's email.
Reset password using token from email

item.description: Authentication endpoints for registration, login, and password management

item.name: Users

request.description:
Create a new user in the tenant. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.

**roleIds:** Array of role IDs to assign
Get all users in the tenant. Requires 'users.read' or 'users.list' permission.
Get specific user details. Requires 'users.read' permission.

Update user details. Requires 'users.update' permission.

**Note:** Cannot update password or roleIds via this endpoint.
Soft delete a user. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.
Assign roles to a user. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.
Remove roles from a user. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.
Get all permissions for a user. Requires 'users.read' permission.

item.description: User management endpoints with role-based access control

request.description:
Create a new tenant. Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.

**subscriptionTier:** free | starter | professional | enterprise
**slug:** lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens only
Get all tenants. Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.
Get all active tenants. Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.
Get specific tenant details. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.
Get tenant by slug. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.
Update tenant details. Requires SUPER_ADMIN or ADMIN role.
Soft delete a tenant. Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.
Activate a tenant. Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.
Deactivate a tenant. Requires SUPER_ADMIN role.

item.name: Audit Logs

query.description: CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LOGIN, LOGOUT

request.description:
Query audit logs with comprehensive filters. Requires AUDIT_READ permission.

**Actions:** CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LOGIN, LOGOUT, EXPORT, IMPORT
Get all audit logs for a specific user. Requires AUDIT_READ permission.

Get all audit logs for a specific resource. Requires AUDIT_READ permission.

**resource:** User, Tenant, JiraConnection, etc.

Export audit logs to CSV format. Requires AUDIT_READ permission.

Supports same filters as Query Audit Logs endpoint.

item.description: Audit logging endpoints for compliance and security monitoring
